text: Ananya Kasaravalli is an Indian film actress and director in the Kannada film industry, and a theatre artist in Karnataka, India. Some of the notable films of Ananya Kasaravalli as an actress include Kaada Beladingalu (2007) and Naayi Neralu (2006). Her first directorial feature was Harikatha Prasanga/ Chronicles of Hari (2016); won the Best film - In the Indian Cinema Competition section in the 9th Bengaluru International Film Festival. ==Awards== {| class="wikitable" |- ! She studied in LV Prasad Film & TV Academy, Chennai. In 2016 she directed her first film ′Harikatha Prasanga′, which was based on a short story named ′Beladi Harishchandra′ by writer Gopalakrishna Pai.
